rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and views.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private master bedroom oriented according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow. Includes an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom with natural lighting and ventilation, strategically placed on the east side as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Efficient space for additional family members or guest use. Features cross-ventilation with adjoining courtyard access.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Dedicated guest room to accommodate visitors, ensuring privacy and natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed for efficiency with ample storage and a view of the outdoor garden. Integrated with dining area as per contemporary design norms.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, offering space for formal meals and casual gatherings.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully equipped private gym with sound insulation. Strategically located to maintain privacy from living areas while ensuring natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Well-appointed servant quarters providing comfortable accommodation for staff, including an attached restroom and small kitchen area.

rooms.name: Storage
rooms.description: Multi-purpose storage space integrated within the villa layout for utility and personal items.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Primary entry with a welcoming porch designed to align with Vastu principles. Includes security features and an inviting facade.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Dedicated service entrance for staff and utility deliveries, ensuring efficient flow without disturbing main living areas.

openings.name: Balcony/Verandah
openings.description: Overlooking the garden area; designed to maximize morning sunlight and natural ventilation.

vastu_considerations.explanation: Main entrance is oriented north for auspicious entry.
Master bedroom positioned in the south to harness positive energy flow and ensure calm atmosphere.

irregular_plot_handling.description: Design adapted to accommodate irregular plot shape by utilizing asymmetrical room placements and flexible partitioning, ensuring optimal natural light and ventilation throughout the villa.
